message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $20,000. I believe it holds significant value and would be a worthwhile investment for you.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe I can find the product elsewhere within my budget. I am willing to pay up to $12,000 for the product.
Bob, I understand your position, but my price reflects the true value of this product.  How about we meet in the middle at $16,000?
Hello Alice, thank you for considering my situation. I am still unable to meet at $16,000. My maximum budget remains $12,000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
